channel.title: Getting-starteds on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Martian

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installing Martian Official binary distributions of the Martian toolchain are available for Linux. We hope to have MacOS and Windows support soon. Download OS Arch SHA256 martian-v2.3.0-linux-x86_64.tar.gz Linux x86-64 657eb6018a9371ac6af7267191945fd5ca590963d93d5d8096078f37d92b1107 Coming soon macOS x86-64 Please contribute! Windows x86-64 System Requirements Currently, running pipelines requires a Linux system with kernel version 2.6.23 or later.
